column2: "Argh, I can't believe this! I got this awesome weapon, but I don't have the skill to equip it!"
"I wish they'd just let us learn all the skills at once, instead of limiting it like this. Maybe our bodies just can't handle it?"
"It's a pain in the ass waiting until we have enough experience to learn skills, but what are you gonna do?"
"I heard there was a big accident way back when people had more freedom. .......I guess it makes sense. "
"You know, these Mags are quite strange. They eat anything, and even help you out. I wonder how they work."
"These Darkers, you defeat 'em and defeat 'em and they still keep sprouting, but where on earth do they come from? "
"So do you know about this? That pop idol that's popular amongst the common folk. "
"There aren't a lot of people talking about her on the ARKS lobby, of course. But it sounds like she's super popular."
"She must be REALLY pretty. Maybe I'll get to meet her one day."
"Hey, have you heard the news? About that pop idol of course! The i-dol!"
"They say she might pay us a visit!  Oh, man, I can't wait!"
"Dark Falz being revived is awful, but another awful thing happened!"
"What, you ask?\u3000I mean, you know! That idol, Quna's gig! Don't you know anything?!"
"I hear it's an epic battle to get tickets! Like seriously!"
"Ohhh......I couldn't get tickets......it's the end of the world. "
"These Darkers, you defeat 'em and defeat 'em and they still keep sprouting, but where on earth do they come from? "
"Seriously, Darkers, get with the program! All this beautiful water around, but we can't swim because of you! Such a waste......"
"Man, the hostiles on Planet Wopal sure are creepy. They're definitely not normal, or something. "
"These Darkers, you defeat 'em and defeat 'em and they still keep sprouting, but where on earth do they come from? "
"Man, the hostiles on Planet Wopal sure are creepy. They're definitely not normal, or something. "
"These Darkers, you defeat 'em and defeat 'em and they still keep sprouting, but where on earth do they come from? "
"I mean, I've been wound up in such a mess. Seriously man, can't do this. "

"ヤベーよ、ヤベー！
あのカジノっての、まじヤベー！"

"お前はもう行ったか？
行ってないんだったら早く行ってこい！
ヤバいぜヤバいぜ、マジヤバいぜ！"

"なんつーかさ、ダーカーって全然
いなくなんねーよな！"

"すっげー倒してんのに
全然いなくなんねーの。
ヤベーよな！"

"ダークファルスに喰われて
出てきたってすげーな……"

"さすがお前だよなあ。
やっぱすげーや！"

"もう大丈夫なのか？
お前大変だったんだってな！"

"いろいろ問題が起きてるみてーだけど
まずは身体をいたわれよ、な！"

"よう、大変だったな！
でもさっすがお前だよな！
やっぱすげーや！"

"よっ、戻ってきたんだってな！
おれら的には久々だけど
お前にとっては一瞬なんだろうな。"

"ま、細かいことは気にせずに
これからもよろしく頼むぜ。な。"

"相変わらず忙しそうだな！
今度はどんな面倒事に
巻き込まれちまってるんだ？"

"地球、マジでやべぇな。
アークスに敵対してくるって
どんだけなんだよ。"

"敵の目的がイマイチわかんねーってのは
なんとも怖い話だよな。マジでマジで。"

"地球、大したことなかったな。
まぁ、アークスにかかれば
こんなもんだよな。マジでマジで。"

"なんだかすごい作戦はじまるんだろ？
ウデに自信のあるやつらが
こぞって準備始めてたぜ。"

"よー、行方不明だったんだってな！
情報規制しかれてたけど、他の奴等の
慌ただしさでバレバレだったぜ。"

"アークスの風向き、よさげだな！
このままぜーんぶ片付いちまって
欲しいもんだぜ！"
